name: miniaero

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Proxy Application. MiniAero is a mini-application for the evaulation of
programming models and hardware for next generation platforms.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: kokkos-legacy
dependencies.description:
Kokkos implements a programming model in C++ for writing performance
portable applications targeting all major HPC platforms.
